articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: But the strong winds that fanned the flames were expected to pick up again today, worsening conditions.
articles.title: Los Angeles firefighters see progress in containing blazes

articles.author: Hyunjoo Jin, Jack Kim
articles.description: The flight data and cockpit voice recorders on the Jeju Air jet that crashed on Dec. 29 stopped recording about four minutes before the airliner hit a concrete structure at South Korea's Muan airport, the transport ministry said on Saturday.
articles.title: Jeju Air 'black box' data missing from last 4 minutes before crash, South Korea ministry says

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The measures constituted the broadest U.S. package of sanctions so far targeting Russia's oil and gas revenues.
articles.title: Russia says it will continue oil and gas projects despite US sanctions

articles.author: Max Hunder
articles.description: It is the first time Ukraine has announced the capture of North Korean soldiers alive since their entry into the war.
articles.title: Ukraine captures two North Korean soldiers in Kursk, Zelenskiy says

articles.author: Tala Ramadan
articles.description: Lebanon and Syria will work together to secure their land borders, as well as to delineate both land and sea borders, Lebanon's caretaker Prime Minister Najib Mikati said on Saturday in Damascus.
articles.title: Lebanon to work with Syria to strengthen borders

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Sudan's army said on Saturday it had entered the central city of Wad Madani and was pushing out its paramilitary rivals the Rapid Support Forces (RSF), a step which if completed successfully would be its biggest gain in nearly two years of war.
articles.title: Sudanese army advances to retake city of Wad Madani from RSF

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: South Korea's impeached President Yoon Suk Yeol will not attend the first hearing of the trial to determine if he his removed from office or reinstated, Yonhap news agency quoted his lawyer as saying on Sunday.
articles.title: South Korea Yoon's lawyer says president will not attend first impeachment trial hearing, Yonhap reports

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Authorities in Moldova's separatist Transdniestria region said on Saturday that energy conservation measures have allowed them to ease restrictions caused by a halt to Russian gas supplies, with the duration of rolling blackouts to be further reduced.
articles.title: Moldova's separatist Transdniestria region reduces blackouts

articles.author: Andrea Shalal
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden spoke with Pope Francis on Saturday and awarded him the Presidential Medal of Freedom with Distinction, the nation's highest civilian honor, the White House said.
articles.title: Biden awards Pope Francis medal of freedom, highest US civilian honor

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Malaysia Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said the government did not conceal any document relating to jailed former premier Najib Razak's home detention, state media reported.
articles.title: Malaysia PM denies hiding document on ex-premier Najib's home detention
